title: The Shawshank Redemption
contents: text | Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather

title: The Dark Knight
contents: text | When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

contents: text | The life of boxer 'Jake LaMotta' , whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

title: Chinatown
contents: text | A private detective hired to expose an adulterer in 1930s Los Angeles finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

title: My Neighbor Totoro
contents: text | When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

title: Dersu Uzala
contents: text | The Russian army sends an explorer on an expedition to the snowy Siberian wilderness where he makes friends with a seasoned local hunter.

title: Shutter Island
contents: text | In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
contents: text | Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

title: No Country for Old Men
contents: text | Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

title: Dial M for Murder
contents: text | A former tennis player tries to arrange his wife's murder after learning of her affair.

title: The Gold Rush
contents: text | A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune, and is smitten with a girl he sees in a dance hall.

title: Klaus
contents: text | A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus , their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

title: The Thing
contents: text | A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
contents: text | A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

title: The Seventh Seal
contents: text | A knight returning to Sweden after the Crusades seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

title: The Elephant Man
contents: text | A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.

title: The Sixth Sense
contents: text | A frightened, withdrawn Philadelphia boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

title: The Truman Show
contents: text | An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

title: Jurassic Park
contents: text | A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

title: Wild Strawberries
contents: text | After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

title: The Third Man
contents: text | Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

title: Memories of Murder
contents: text | In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

title: V for Vendetta
contents: text | In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V," plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

title: Blade Runner
contents: text | A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

title: Trainspotting
contents: text | Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

title: Inside Out
contents: text | After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
contents: text | British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors in occupied Burma, not knowing that the allied forces are planning a daring commando raid through the jungle to destroy it.

title: Fargo
contents: text | Minnesota car salesman Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

title: Finding Nemo
contents: text | After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

title: Warrior
contents: text | The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
contents: text | After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

title: Gone with the Wind
contents: text | The manipulative daughter of a Georgia plantation owner conducts a turbulent romance with a roguish profiteer during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

title: Tokyo Story
contents: text | An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

title: On the Waterfront
contents: text | An ex-prize fighter turned New Jersey longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses, including his older brother, as he starts to connect with the grieving sister of one of the syndicate's victims.

title: My Father and My Son
contents: text | The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after the military coup of Turkey in 1980.

title: Dune
contents: text | Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

title: Wild Tales
contents: text | Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.

title: Stalker
contents: text | A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

title: Prisoners
contents: text | When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

title: The Deer Hunter
contents: text | An in-depth examination of the ways in which the Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of several friends in a small steel mill town in Pennsylvania.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
contents: text | A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

title: The General
contents: text | After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through enemy lines.

title: Sherlock Jr.
contents: text | A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

title: Persona
contents: text | A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.

title: Gran Torino
contents: text | Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, Thao Lor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino .

title: Z
contents: text | The public murder of a prominent politician and doctor amid a violent demonstration is covered up by military and government officials. A tenacious magistrate is determined not to let them get away with it.

title: Before Sunrise
contents: text | A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

title: Mary and Max
contents: text | A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

title: Catch Me If You Can
contents: text | Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
contents: text | A naive youth leader is appointed to fill a vacancy in the U.S. Senate. His idealistic plans promptly collide with corruption at home and subterfuge from his hero in Washington, but he tries to forge ahead despite attacks on his character.

title: In the Name of the Father
contents: text | A man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

title: Barry Lyndon

title: Gone Girl

title: Room

title: Hacksaw Ridge

contents: text | In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

contents: text | In the antebellum United States, 'Solomon Northup' , a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

contents: text | Maverick teacher John Keating uses poetry to embolden his boarding school students to new heights of self-expression.

title: How to Train Your Dragon

contents: text | After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend in 1st-century Jerusalem, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

title: The Handmaiden
contents: text | A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

title: The Wages of Fear

title: Stand by Me
contents: text | After the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

title: Gangs of Wasseypur
contents: text | A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

title: Platoon
